abstract: Imeem lets users play any song they want on their computers, but not on cellphones. Since there is no way–yet–to pirate music on a cellphone, it hopes to sell music on the go.
snippet: Imeem lets users play any song they want on their computers, but not on cellphones. Since there is no way–yet–to pirate music on a cellphone, it hopes to sell music on the go.
lead_paragraph: Update | 2:47 p.m.  Clarified to say that Warner Music Group was the only record label to sue Imeem.

headline.main: Why Imeem’s Music Isn’t Free on Cellphones
